title: How did S&P Global Inc (NYSE: SPGI)'s diluted GAAP EPS compare to management projections (at midpoint) on an annual basis in 2024? Format as % BEAT or MISS and express answer with two decimal points. Use guidance provided on an annual basis.
description:
First, you have to find the actual FY 2024 diluted GAAP EPS, which is $12.35 per share 
 
 Next, you have to find the latest FY 2024 annual GAAP diluted EPS guidance and then use that guidance to find the midpoint
 - The guidance range that was given in the 3Q 2024 report was $11.95 to $12.15
 - Therefore, the midpoint is ($11.95 + $12.15)/2 = $12.05 per share
 
 Finally, you have to calculate percent beat vs guidance at midpoint: (12.35 âˆ’ 12.05) / 12.05 = 0.30 / 12.05 = 2.49%, which represents a 2.49% BEAT

rubric.criteria: Find that the FY 2024 diluted GAAP EPS is $12.35 per share
Find that the most recent guidance for FY 2024 is from Q3 2024 press release.
Find that the FY 2024 annual GAAP diluted EPS guidance range reported in Q3 2024 is from $11.95 to $12.15
Calculate the midpoint of the guidance to be $12.05 per share
Calculate the difference between actual guidance and the midpoint: (12.35/12.05)-1 = 2.49%
Since the difference is positive this is a BEAT
Round final answer to two decimal points and use given format: 2.49% BEAT
